select * from location where
id = #{id} and
name ilike #{name} and
type ilike (#{type}) and
parent ilike #{description} and
status ilike (#{status}) and
(name ilike #{q} ) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select r.*
, case when u.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from locationrate r
left join locationratereaction u on u.id = r.id and u.author = r.author and u.userId = #{userId}
where
r.id = #{id} and
r.author = #{author} and
r.rate = #{rate} and
r.time >= #{time} and
r.review ilike #{review} and
r.usefulCount >= (#{usefulCount}) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select * from locationcomment where
commentId = #{commentId} and
id = #{id} and
author = #{author} and
userId = #{userId} and
comment ilike #{comment} and
time >= #{time} and
updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select * from locationinfomation where
id = #{id} and
followercount = #{followercount} and
followingcount = #{followingcount} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select a.*, b.replycount, b.usefulcount
, case when d.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from locationcommentthread a left join locationcommentthreadinfo b on a.commentId = b.commentid
left join locationcommentthreadreaction d on a.commentId = d.commentId and a.userId = #{userId}
where
a.commentId = #{commentId} and
a.id = #{id} and
a.author = #{author} and
a.time >= #{time} and
a.updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
a.histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}
